verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When Jesus comes to reward His servants, Whether it be noon or night, Faithful to Him will He find us watching, With our lamps all trimmed and bright?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O can we say we are ready, brother? Ready for the soulâ€™s bright home? Say, will He find you and me still watching, Waiting, watching when the Lord shall come?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: If, at the dawn of the early morning, He shall call us one by one, When to the Lord we restore our talents, Will He answer you, "Well done?"

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Have we been true to the trust He left us? Do we seek to do our best? If in our hearts there is naught condemns us, We shall have a glorious rest.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blessed are those whom the Lord finds watching, In His glory they shall share; If He shall come at the dawn or midnight, Will He find us watching there?
